data.feedback: Architecture is well-designed with modern Dart 3.0 patterns, proper Riverpod/Dio integration, and excellent backend alignment. One minor file categorization issue doesn't impact implementation.

issues.description: Story 1 lists .env.example as filesToCreate but it already exists
issues.recommendation: Developer should modify existing file rather than create new

suggestions: Consider adding test patterns in Story 1 for test_driver setup
Ensure .env is added to .gitignore and pubspec.yaml assets
